Linux常用一键测速脚本

云梦泽
4周 ago

bench.sh 秋水逸冰一键测速脚本

wget -qO- bench.sh | bash

or

curl -Lso- bench.sh | bash

或者

wget -qO- 86.re/bench.sh | bash

or

curl -so- 86.re/bench.sh | bash

项目地址：

https://github.com/teddysun/across/blob/master/bench.sh
